transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Good morning, good afternoon sir.
Executive: Ji, good afternoon sir. Sir, sir baat kar raha hun IndiaMART ke head office se, kaise hain aap?
Customer: Ji, bilkul bhai, sir, to leads to nahi aa rahe hain sir, kaise aate rahenge sir, bataiye leads ya achcha achcha nahi hai.
Executive: Aa raha hai sir, leads to aa raha hai sir.
Customer: Dekhiye hamara jo catalog hai, aap ek baar hamari company ke profile pe catalog check kijiye, thik hai sir? Post recording hum logon ko lead bhejiye na, kya bhej rahe hain dekhiye, pehle pehle aata tha cap service bhi, ye sab hum nahi bhejte, Aadhar printing software, ID card software, ye sab kuch nahi lete fir bhi aap log bhej rahe hain, taxi service bhi.
Executive: Aadhar print software pe nahi lete to usko not relevant mark kariye.
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Printing software aapke paas hai, printing software aapke paas hoga aapke product mein, check kiya aapne?
Customer: ID card software hai, thik hai, wo Aadhar ye sab kuch nahi hai, cap service service nahi hai, hum log to cap booking app lete hain provide.
Executive: Abhi main batata hun aapko ek minute.
Customer: Aap ye bataiye hum logon ko na sir, is wala lead bhejiye na wo kya bolte hain MLM ka daily.
Executive: Main kuch bhejta nahi hun sir, aap is cheez ko pehle samajhiye ki aapke products mein jo matlab jo services aapne add kari hai na, uske according lead aati hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ab jo lead galat aa rahi hai, us pe baat karte hain pehle. Aap ek kaam kariye, abhi aap seller panel pe hain IndiaMART pe?
Customer: Ji, ji.
Executive: Thik hai. Aur subah hi maine sir Masoom sir ko matlab phone kiya tha aur apna number bhi diya tha. To fir customer care pe to call karne ki as such koi zarurat thi nahi, mera number bhi unke paas tha, kal bhi unse baat hui, aaj bhi unko maine subah call kiya ki baat karwaiye, main baat karta hun, kahan kya problem aa rahi hai. To mera number unhone aapko diya nahi?
Customer: Number diya nahi, nahi baat hua tha lekin humne udhar click kar diya number automatically connect ho gaya, thik hai baat karna hi padega na isiliye. Wo usse pehle Ashish sir se, aapke sir se, aapka aap new hain na, aapke saath hamare baat nahi hua isiliye sir. Aap new hain na hamare manager?
Executive: Haan keh sakte ho new hun kyunki iske pehle Ashish se baat hoti rahi hogi.
Customer: Haan Ashish sir se baat nahi hota hai, do din baad do teen din baad hue, usse pehle Abhishek sir the na Abhishek?
Executive: Uske pehle jisne aapko service sell kari hogi wo raha hoga ye ho sakta hai.
Customer: Haan haan Abhishek sir wo to bahut hi achche achche lead dete the matlab bahut hi achcha hota tha aur Ashish sir se aaye.
Executive: Nahi.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi nahi suniye meri baat pehle aap. Koi aapko lead deta nahi hai.
Customer: Lead aate rehte the us time wo jab tha to.
Executive: Usme koi specific person aapko lead deta nahi hai agar aapka account koi manage kar raha hai iska matlab ye nahi ki wo aapko lead bhejta hai. Ye sab matchmaking ka process hai.
Customer: To kaise grow ho jaye sir, meri baat suniye sir, kaise grow ho company aur kaise achche se lead mile ek baar humne samjha dijiye sir, aap bhi kuch kijiye.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul. Achcha main bhi kuch karun, thik hai.
Customer: Thik hai sir.
Executive: Thik hai abhi ek kaam kariye aap setting section mein aaiye apne IndiaMART pe hain na aap?
Customer: Haan setting section, thik hai.
Executive: Usme right side corner mein upar buylead preferences diya hai.
Customer: Setting mein click kiya, okay okay. Haan.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Buylead isme click kara na?
Executive: Settings pe click kar paye sir aap ki nahi?
Customer: Haan haan haan.
Executive: Thik hai, usme kya kya dikh raha hai abhi aapko?
Customer: Account setting, PNS call setting.
Executive: Haan bas bas sahi hai, buylead preferences mein aana hai aapko.
Customer: Thik hai, click kar diya. Haan.
Executive: Thik hai ab us us page mein scroll karke sabse neeche aaiye.
Customer: Neeche aaye. Thik hai ek likha hoga category preferences.
Executive: Ji usme click kare. Usko click kare, thik hai haan.
Customer: Click kiya.
Executive: Ab ye bataiye ye jo paanch category beech mein likhi hui hai based on your buylead consumption isme abhi aap deal karte hain?
Customer: Kaun sa matlab?
Executive: Achcha ruko fir se batata hun, category preferences aapne open kar liya?
Customer: Haan haan cap service, Aadhar print software, supermarket billing software, taxi, ek digital dairy dairy software. Nahi wo cap service hum log nahi dete.
Executive: To iske lead kyun utha rahe hain aapke paas se koi bhi?
Customer: Are kisne likha diya main hamare to calling department hai na to wo log bhi sambhalte hain.
Executive: To unko bataiye na iske lead nahi leni hai aap logon ko, lead aap loge to iske lead aana start ho gayi aapke account mein isi wajah se.
Customer: Haan thik hai ye paancho cut kar dijiye, dairy software bhi humen nahi chahiye, nahi lete.
Executive: To jo jo sunte rahiye sir pehle suniye bhi to aap bolte rahenge to kaise hoga. Ab cap services mein kyunki aap deal nahi karte to isko cross karke aap remove karke confirm kariye.
Customer: Cross kar diya aur confirm kiya.
Executive: Confirm bhi karna hai na ab mere ko cross check kar lun ek baar refresh karke.
Customer: Confirm nahi hua haan ho gaya hai. Haan ye ek to hat gaya ab dairy software bhi hata dijiye.
Executive: Supermarket billing software.
Customer: Haan matlab jisme jisme nahi karte hain wo sab hataiye ye sab ke lead isiliye to aa rahi hai aapke account mein. Haan kya kis ye kaise hua bataiye to sir?
Executive: Kaise hua?
Customer: Ye hua aap logon ke buylead consumption se jab aapke account mein is category ki buylead consume kari gayi hai is wajah se.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Likha hua hai enter buylead mein jab likhenge isiliye ye sab kuch aa rahe hain, right sir?
Executive: Dekho main samjhata hun in in services ki lead aapke yahan se kisi ne purchase kari hai.
Customer: Okay purchase kiya isiliye usi recording lead aate rehte hain.
Executive: Uske buylead purchasing behavior ke according aapke paas lead aane lagti hai. Abhi maan lo ye to chhodo ye to fir bhi kuch milta julta hai agar aapne maan lo galti se aapke yahan se koi account se shoes ki lead le le.
Customer: Haan sir.
Executive: To agle din se shoes ki lead aane lagegi.
Customer: Haan thik hai sir thik hai thank you sir. Samajh gaya abhi matlab kitna ghate par tha company aapne bilkul achcha samjha diya.
Executive: Are maine to kal hi call karke Masoom ji se baat kari thi aur unko bola ki bhai meri baat karao kya dikkat aa rahi hai kyunki export ke liye bhi bol rahe the na karne ke liye to maine puchha to bol.
Customer: Haan humne bola tha jo aap log itna achcha service de rahe the do month se fir lead kyun nahi aa rahe hain?
Executive: Ab sir jiski lead aap zyada lene lagenge.
Customer: Matlab new new banda join hua hai na udhar se koi utha liya ek lead nahi hai usi recording lead aate rehte hain isiliye.
Executive: Haan to usko pehle samjhana aap sir jo naya banda aapke yahan join ho gaya na.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Thodi gadbadi kar di hai. Thik hai sir ab ruk jao mujhe cross check kar lene do aap pehle kya kya hataya aapne haan paancho hata diya aapne thik hai.
Customer: Thik hai sir paancho hata diya.
Executive: Ab ruk jaaiye ab fir se hum buylead section mein aayenge jahan se hum buylead consume karte hain, thik hai buyleads mein aaiye.
Customer: Buylead.
Executive: Ab ye bataiye jo lead ab jo dikh rahi hain ye kaam ki hai game website.
Customer: Ab game software development sir haan ye hai gaming haan haan bilkul sahi hai sir.
Executive: Isko.
Customer: Kitne mushkil chal rahe the company mein.
Executive: Sir mushkil to chalo abhi thode din ka hua hoga business to aap log ka IndiaMART se achcha hi hai jo mujhe pata hai.
Customer: Haan haan haan achcha hai aap logon ke wajah se hi hai na sir.
Executive: Haan bilkul bilkul.
Customer: Isme chicken road wali zyada aati hai lead mujhe pata hai kyunki wo demanding bhi thoda zyada hai.
Executive: Ek baat bataiye sir abhi to chicken road game development to karte hain thik hai agar ye sab kuch lead leke hum log agar sell kare to koi problem nahi aayega na?
Executive: Matlab fir se puchiye sir.
Customer: Matlab chicken road game ke liye jo log inquiry kar rahe hain thik hai sir thik hai. Chicken game wala haan to ye log bahut hi matlab kisi ne ha hai wo log bhi inquiry kar dete hain unka requirement hai bol ke hum log lete hain wo log paisa hum logon ko de do itna hara hai aisa kuch lead hum logon ko nahi dijiye sir.
Executive: Ab sir wo dekho agar kya hota hai agar buyer mein aisa requirement form fill karega kuch bheja hota hai na to fir wo as a buylead.
Customer: Aisa kuch baat nahi hai na Abhishek sir ko bhi bola aap log charges lijiye na 10 rupay karke bhi charges lijiye jo inquiry dalega uska charges lijiye 10 rupay.
Executive: Haan ye aapne ek cheez sahi boli iska jo feedback aaya hai public open platform hai agar har buyer se shayad hum log agar aisa karane lage waise bola hai kisi ne aur bhi client ka suggestion tha.
Customer: Humne bhi bola tha pehle wo Abhishek sir ko itna fake lead aa rahe hain bataiye jiska MLM ka knowledge hi nahi hai thik hai sir wo bhi inquiry karte hain MLM software ke liye bataiye kaise hoga baat to matlab isiliye un logon se bhi charges lijiye warna hum clap kare to inquiry dalne se pehle 10 rupay de jinka jinka agar zarurat hai wahi inquiry kare to hum log company aur bhi bade bade platform lete rahenge aap logon se aur fake lead bhi nahi aayega hamare bhi pareshani nahi hoga aap logon ko jitne sare company aaye kisi company register bhi nahi kiya is mahine nahi karenge register aapka bhi ghata ho raha hai sir to ye baat aapke jo senior sir log hain unke saath discuss kijiye.
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Customer: Isme ek cheez aur thi isme jaise abhi recently aapne ye maximizer plan liya tha hai na?
Executive: Ji ji ji aap logon ko bola ki achcha achcha lead aayenge to do month se itna zyada ghatiya lead aa rahe hain bataiye sir log to hume daat rahe the kyun liya ye bada bada package lead nahi aa rahe humne bola sir logon ne bola Ashish sir ne bola to le liya. To humne to socha.
Executive: Achcha hai service usage pe depend karta hai. Pehle aap log waise bhi chalate the kuch kuch chhoti chhoti services chalate the abhi maximizer kya hai aapki services to achchi hai.
Customer: Haan hum log to service dekhiye hamara performance dekhiye aur customer review dekhiye sabhi achcha hai lekin wo Pakistan ke do teen bande one star karke de diya hum logon ko se unke saath baat bhi nahi hua fir bhi de diya kaise pata nahi. Baaki sab 100 100 performance matlab baat cheet sab kuch mein 100 100 the to wo do teen aadmi ne kya manhusiyat kar diya to isiliye ho gaya wo sab kuch.
Executive: Nahi nahi thik hai.
Customer: Thik hai sir to aap hamara jo manager hai IndiaMART ka to hum logon ko thoda matlab process batate jaaiye jo kaise kaise ho sakta hai. Achcha aur foreign lead hum log nazdeek mein.
Executive: Jo galat wali lead aa rahi thi abhi to nahi aayegi aur agar aaye to mera number aap likhiye pehle to nahi to aise hi aap customer care pe call karenge.
Customer: Nahi nahi aapka number to jo hai yahi number hai na sir 81910.
Executive: Nahi nahi ye number mera alag sir.
Customer: Thik hai sir. Thik hai sir. 8076 ek minute sir.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Eight zero seven six three six three six two zero two zero nine five. Nine five aap usme likh lo Ashish of IndiaMART.
Executive: Okay okay thik hai sir aapka aapka good name sir?
Customer: Ji Bikti Songe apne.
Executive: Haan sir us pe call nahi aayegi na call to main already call pe hun na official number pe.
Customer: Koi baat nahi koi baat nahi humne save kar liya na isiliye.
Executive: Achcha thik hai.
Customer: Kya cheez sir kya?
Executive: Sarnadeb Das.
Customer: Achcha achcha thik hai okay fine. Sir isme na do teen cheeze aur hain dhyan rakhne ki zarurat hai aapko. Sir aap log already kar rahe ho reply jo hai lead manager ke through aap zyada se zyada kariye hai na aapka jo rating and review.
Customer: Thik hai thik hai wo log aapko bhi samjha denge. Haan rating and review isme hume dhyan rakhna hai koshish kare jitni achchi jitne zyada buyer bane uski zyada aap rating lijiye kyunki usse jo naya customer aa raha hota hai aapke paas uska confidence badhta hai aapko koi order dene mein jab dekhta hai ki already aap log kafi order utha rahe ho. Hai na aur satisfied client.
Executive: Thik hai sir. Thik hai ab iske baad jo hai aapka dekho catalog ka score bahut achcha hai 85% hai koshish kariye 90% plus ho jaye to aur bhi achchi baat hogi. Hai na paanch category d rank mein thi matlab jiski lead aap log galti se le rahe the wo maine hatwa hi diya hai already. Hai na paanch number aapke PNS number mein add hai to ye bhi achcha hai. To as such aur koi to problem mujhe nahi dikh rahi hai but still agar koi problem jaise hi aati hai aap mujhe immediately whatsapp karoge sir number isiliye maine diya aapko aapko whatsapp mein aapka message kar denge sir. Aur abhi sir ek feedback aayega mere liye aapke paas. Mere liye aayega aapke paas to wo mail ID aap access karte ho jo IndiaMART mein. Haan haan haan bilkul. To sir please mere liye feedback aap de dijiyega current Ashish naam se chahe to aap mention kar dena sir hai na do line likh denge to bahut achcha rahega company samajh payegi feedback hai na kya hai na okay sir aur wo abhi aur ek baat puchna hai sir gaming side gaming mein hum log deal kar sakte hain na sir?
Executive: Are sir kariye na kaun mana kar raha hai?
Customer: Matlab wo sarkar ne kuch problem kiya hai na to isiliye.
Executive: Are to sarkar ne problem kiya hai jab tak IndiaMART pe as such koi aa nahi jata hai jaise maan lijiye pehle kuch main batata hun pharma ke products the jisko government ne ban nahi kiya hua tha to usko bahar bhejte rehte the mere clients to jab ban kar diya to IndiaMART se fir wo products bhi hum add nahi kar sakte agar add yahan pe abhi aap kar pa rahe ho iska matlab aap use kar sakte ho. Mujhe pata hai mobile gaming ke liye kafi zyada leads generate hoti hai restriction to wo hua tha lekin koi issue nahi hai aap samne wala banwa raha hai paisa de raha hai to koi problem hi nahi hai aap bana bana ke dijiye aur kya. Okay okay thik hai sir thank you so much sir bahut hi achcha service kiya aapne.
Executive: Ji ji you are welcome sir thank you have a nice day.
summary:
Concerns:

- Leads not relevant to business are being received.

- Wants to understand how to get good leads.

- Wants to know if they can deal in gaming.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how buylead consumption works.

- Removed irrelevant categories from buylead preferences.

- Provided personal contact number for future assistance.

- Explained the importance of ratings and reviews.

- Clarified that they can deal in gaming.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will provide feedback to the executive.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, category preferences, gaming
